author: Sebastien Lucot
title: M√©t√©o. Une temp√™te sur le Cotentin pour la Saint-Sylvestre, avec des rafales √† 120 km/h | La Presse de la Manche
text:
Voir mon actu Suivre La Presse de la Manche Eole aura marqu√© les esprits en 2023, avec des coups de vent qui s‚Äôencha√Ænent depuis l‚Äôautomne sur le nord-ouest de la France . Un nouveau, qualifi√© de temp√™te , abordera la fa√ßade ouest du d√©partement de la Manche dans la soir√©e de ce samedi 30 d√©cembre 2023.
M√™me si les vents attendus vont d√©passer les 100 km/h , les rafales seront, fort heureusement, bien moins puissantes que lors de la temp√™te Ciaran du 2 novembre 2023, un √©v√©nement climatique exceptionnel.
120 km/h de Granville √† Cherbourg Cependant, la vigilance sera de mise pour cette temp√™te nomm√©e Henk . √Ä l‚Äôapproche d‚Äôune perturbation ‚Äì o√π les pr√©cipitations seront copieuses ‚Äì le gradient de la pression atmosph√©rique va nettement se resserrer.
D√®s la tomb√©e du jour, les rafales monteront d‚Äôun cran pour atteindre leur paroxysme vers minuit , dans un flux de sud √† sud-ouest. Elles flirteront avec les 120 km/h de Granville √† Cherbourg , sur la c√¥te , possiblement 130 km/h sur les caps expos√©s .
Entre 22 heures et 1 heure du matin , des bourrasques de l‚Äôordre de 100 km/h pourront balayer l‚Äôint√©rieur des terres , principalement dans l‚Äôint√©rieur du Cotentin.
Dans le centre et le sud de la Manche, elles se cantonneront √† des valeurs plus mod√©r√©es, autour de 80 km/h .
√Ä lire aussi
Temp√™te Ciar√°n. O√π en est Orange concernant le remplacement des poteaux ? Apr√®s une tr√®s l√©g√®re accalmie dans la nuit et la matin√©e de dimanche, un r√©gime d‚Äôaverses se mettra en place √† l‚Äôarri√®re de la perturbation.
Vid√©os : en ce moment sur Actu Les vents, tournant √† l‚Äôouest, se renforceront de nouveau dans l‚Äôheure de midi et au cours de l‚Äôapr√®s-midi pour atteindre des valeurs similaires √† la veille. Les rafales s‚Äôessouffleront ensuite au cours de la nuit de la Saint-Sylvestre et pour le passage √† la nouvelle ann√©e.
Voir le tweet
Cet √©v√©nement a √©t√© plac√© en vigilance jaune par les services de M√©t√©o-France . Cependant, √† l‚Äôheure o√π nous √©crivons ces lignes, les m√©t√©orologues √©voquent ¬´ un passage en vigilance orange ¬ª qui ¬´ reste possible ¬ª, √† quelques heures avant le d√©but de l‚Äô√©pisode en fonction ¬´ l‚Äô√©volution de la situation ¬ª.
Sur ces deux journ√©es, entre 20 et 30 millim√®tres de pluie sont pr√©vus, le tout sous une certaine douceur, 10 ¬∞C de jour comme de nuit.

author: Èó® Â®á
title: Los inmigrantes se encuentran con la Guardia Nacional de Texas al cruzar la frontera de Estados Unidos con M√©xico
text: El conflicto entre Washington y el estado de Texas contin√∫a esta semana con el foco en la inmigraci√≥n. Los inmigrantes sortean el alambre de espino colocado por Texas en la frontera de Estados Unidos con M√©xico mientras que la Guardia Nacional les espera al otro lado. Esto sucede despu√©s de que el Tribunal Supremo de EE. UU. estableciera que los agentes de patrulla fronteriza tienen el poder de decidir cortar los alambres de espino colocados por Texas para prevenir la entrada de inmigrantes. El presidente de Estados Unidos, Joe Biden, inst√≥ al Congreso la semana pasada a aprobar una ley para enfrentarse a la crisis de inmigraci√≥n en la frontera sur del pa√≠s, prometiendo el cierre de la frontera una vez aprobada la ley. Biden, que busca revalidar su mandato en las elecciones de noviembre, se ha enfrentado a un n√∫mero r√©cord de inmigrantes ilegales detenidos durante su presidencia. El Partido Republicano mantiene que se deber√≠an haber mantenido las pol√≠ticas de frontera efectuadas por el anterior presidente Donald Trump. Las autoridades texanas han tomado el control sobre un parque en la ciudad fronteriza de Eagle Pass, donde arrestan a inmigrantes y limitan el acceso a la patrulla de frontera federal. La opini√≥n est√° dividida. Algunos vecinos est√°n frustrados por el flujo de inmigrantes indocumentados y con la respuesta. Aquellos que dan la bienvenida a los nuevos inmigrantes sienten que la ret√≥rica pol√≠tica es peligrosa y no ayuda a nadie. Los n√∫meros han aumentado en los √∫ltimos a√±os, con m√°s de 10.000 inmigrantes diarios cruzando la frontera en diciembre, seg√∫n datos gubernamentales. Mientras el pa√≠s se dirige a unas elecciones presidenciales, los analistas argumentan que mantener la tensi√≥n es beneficioso electoralmente para el Partido Republicano. "Todo lo que hace el gobernador de Texas, Greg Abbott, es mirar a la situaci√≥n a trav√©s de unas lentes pol√≠ticas, y no como un problema de seguridad p√∫blica que hay que resolver o como algo que requiere la cooperaci√≥n entre dos pa√≠ses. √âl solo piensa en cerrar la frontera y enviar a los agentes del Departamento de Seguridad P√∫blica de Texas a las zonas fronterizas, algo que molesta a la administraci√≥n Biden. Abbott claramente busca r√©dito pol√≠tico", dijo Tony Payan, director del Centro para EE. UU. y M√©xico de Instituto Baker de la Universidad de Rice.

author: VNExplorer
title: Why isn't Jalen Hurts, or anyone else, having any fun?
text:
Philadelphia Eagles quarterback Jalen Hurts pitches the ball to tight end Dallas Goedert during the first half of an NFL football game against the Seattle Seahawks, Monday, Dec. 18, 2023, in Seattle.
PHILADELPHIA ‚àí There‚Äôs nothing wrong with being a perfectionist.
And certainly, that trait is welcomed among players who always feel they can get better. Eagles quarterback Jalen Hurts, for example, often says, ‚ÄúThere‚Äôs never an arrival.‚Äù
Yet being in the locker room Monday night, you would think the Eagles had lost to the Giants rather than beating them 33-25. Wide receiver A.J. Brown refused to talk to the media, saying, ‚ÄúI‚Äôve got nothing nice to say.‚Äù
Fellow wide receiver DeVonta Smith said, ‚ÄúI‚Äôm not happy.‚Äù
Here‚Äôs a photo gallery from the game:
Then Hurts and Jason Kelce had what appeared to be a serious conversation at Hurts‚Äô locker for about 10-15 minutes.
Welcome to the ‚ÄúEye on the Eagles‚Äù newsletter. It sure seems like the Eagles are a bunch of angry birds üò† ü¶Ö, even though they could conceivably clinch the NFC East title this weekend if the Cowboys lose Saturday against Detroit (11-4) while the Eagles beat Arizona (3-12) on Sunday.
That üê¶Cardinals game also marks the return of former Eagles defensive coordinator Jonathan Gannon, who left under some interesting circumstances two days after the Super Bowl. The Cardinals admitted to tampering by contacting him a few days before the game, a dead period for coaches whose teams were playing that weekend
The Eagles are also in the running for the No. 1 seed in the NFC playoffs.
CHANCE FOR THE HALL: Ex-Eagles cornerback Eric Allen among 15 finalists for NFL Hall of Fame‚Äôs Class of 2024
Anyway, I asked Hurts on Wednesday about the locker room talks, in addition to the sideline confrontation when head coach Nick Sirianni yelled something at defensive line coach Jeremiah Washburn and Smith, with Brown in the background.
‚ÄúVery observant of you,‚Äù Hurts said (Hey, what can I say?).
‚ÄúThose are conversations that happen every game,‚Äù he continued. ‚ÄúThe things that you don‚Äôt see. Sometimes people don‚Äôt know what they don‚Äôt know. But in terms of constant pursuit of excellence and playing to the level we want to play to, it takes all 11. It takes great communication. It takes great leadership. So those conversations go on, just for the betterment of us as a team, talking about what we saw, and how we can continue to move forward.‚Äù
And what about the perception that Hurts can‚Äôt enjoy a victory? Sure, the win over the going-nowhere Giants was closer than it should have been after the Eagles gifted New York two touchdowns on a special teams fumble and a pick-6 when Dallas Goedert fell down.
Still, it was a win, and it ended the Eagles‚Äô three-game losing streak.
‚ÄúEveryone has their own preconceived notion on something,‚Äù Hurts said. ‚ÄúI know I personally havee been looked at like that for a long time because there‚Äôs value in losing. That does something to you. As a competitor, it drives you and pushes you forward. You don‚Äôt want to feel those feelings you felt when you came up short in situations. Every competitor is different. Every competitor handles and channels different emotions in different ways. And so, how we channel that as a team, as long as we‚Äôre doing that together, as long as we‚Äôre on the same page, that‚Äôs all that matters.‚Äù
Look, Hurts is the quarterback that he is, with a 28-4 record since 2021, because he is always striving to get better. Smith said he‚Äôs the same way.
‚ÄúThat‚Äôs just how I am,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre not going to always get by, doing the things that we‚Äôre doing. Yeah, we‚Äôre 11-4, but been barely getting by. That don‚Äôt last forever.‚Äù
There is only one game left after the New Year‚Äôs Eve üéâball drops Sunday night in New York City‚Äôs Times Square before the playoffs begin. Maybe the Eagles can start having fun again in 2024.
Follow me on social media Feel free to reach out to me, either via email at [email protected] , or on X (formerly known as Twitter): @Mfranknfl.
But mostly, thanks for being a loyal reader, and hopefully, a subscriber.
And Happy Holidays!
Here are some of my favorite stories from the past week:
This article originally appeared on Delaware News Journal: Why isn‚Äôt Jalen Hurts, or anyone else, having any fun?

author: Autor Generico
title: Les aurores boreals tenyeixen de rosa el cel de Catalunya: les imatges m√©s espectaculars
text:
El cel s'ha tenyit de violeta i rosa la nit d'aquest dijous per les aurores boreals que s'han pogut veure des de diversos punts de Catalunya amb poca contaminaci√≥ lum√≠nica. Per exemple a les muntanyes de Prades, l'altipl√† central, el Montsec o el Bergued√†. Una nit m√†gica que repeteix l'escena que es va viure fa justament cinc mesos, el 10 de maig.
Alguns usuaris han volgut compartir aquest moment tan bonic amb la resta d'internautes i han publicat les imatges que mostren un fenomen astron√≤mic poc habitual en aquestes latituds del planeta causat per una tempesta geomagn√®tica.
Els primers albiraments ja es confirmaven el vespre d'aquest dijous. Des de Prades , a Tarragona, explicaven que han pogut captar el fenomen a trav√©s de la c√†mera, amb "nom√©s cinc segons d'exposici√≥" i, finalment, les han pogut veure a trav√©s de l'ull hum√†.
No nom√©s a Catalunya Les aurores boreals tamb√© s'han pogut veure des d'altres punts de l'estat espanyol i a ciutats europees com It√†lia, Alemanya i √Äustria.
Les imatges del cel tenyit totalment gr√†cies a les aurores boreals s√≥n espectaculars.
